API_Description: Encodes a given URI string to ensure it is safe for transmission over the internet.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'uriEncode' suggests that it is used to encode a URI, which is a common operation to ensure that special characters are properly represented in a URL format.
Returns_Reason: The method is expected to return the encoded version of the input URI string, as encoding typically transforms the input into a safe format.

cURI.description: The URI string that needs to be encoded.
cURI.description_reason: The parameter name 'cURI' indicates that it is a URI string that will be processed by the method.
cURI.type_reason: URIs are typically represented as strings, and encoding operations are performed on string data.
